metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16981 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: stb stb_image.h 2.19, as used in catimg, Emscripten, and other products, has a heap-based buffer overflow in the stbi__out_gif_code function.

criterions.comment: libsfml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
love: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
